content: of your yarn tail to attach an optional pom or simply weave it in with your other end finally turn the beanie right-side-out and fold over the bottom to create the brim that s it thank you so much for downloading the calli beanie pattern and supporting maddy lou crochet i sincerely hope you enjoyed the pattern and your new beanie if you have any corrections to the pattern please don t hesitate to reach out at madisonlouisehansen@gmail com and feel free to share photos of your new creation using #callibeanie page 3 maddy lou crochet the calli beanie photos page 4
